snippet.title: Sniper Elite 4 – Launch Trailer | Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Get your copy NOW at http://reb.to/Sniper4Switch

More than 15 million players have already enjoyed the award-winning, BAFTA-nominated stealth and sniping freedom of Sniper Elite 4. On Nintendo Switch, players can look forward to a host of exclusive new features including:   
Sniper Elite 4 offers: 
• An expansive campaign 
• Genre-defining sniping 
• Trademark X-Ray kill cams
• Iconic WW2 weaponry
• Upgrade and customize 
• Tactical traversal mechanics
• Co-op and multiplayer modes 
• And much more

Exclusively on the Nintendo Switch, players can look forward to a host of exclusive new features including:   
• Motion aim 
• HD rumble support 
• Local play 
• Pro Controller support

Follow us on:
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/rebellion_official/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/sniperelitegame/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SniperElite
Rebellion Discord: https://discord.gg/rebellion 
Rebellion Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/rebelliondevelopments/

Find out more about Rebellion at https://rebellion.com/

#Rebellion #NintendoSwitch #SniperElite4
